content: Black Myth: Wukong's Chapter 3 begins in the freezing mountain trail toward The New West. Below you'll find a guide for the first major area of The New West: Snowhill Path, as well as how to win your first encounter with Macaque Chief, and defeat the mighty Kang-Jin Loong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Black Myth: Wukong's Chapter 3 begins in the freezing mountain trail toward The New West. Below you'll find a guide for the first major area of The New West: Snowhill Path, as well as how to win your first encounter with Macaque Chief, and defeat the mighty Kang-Jin Loong.
